abstract: Grand jury indicts Chicago Police Officer Jason Van Dyke on several counts, including first-degree murder, in shooting death of black teenager Laquan McDonald.
lead_paragraph: A grand jury has indicted a white Chicago police officer charged in the shooting death of Laquan McDonald, a black teenager.

headline.main: Illinois: Formal Indictment in Laquan McDonald Case
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Formal Indictment in Laquan Mcdonald Case

snippet: A grand jury has indicted a white Chicago police officer charged in the shooting death of Laquan McDonald, a black teenager.
